html:
9.24.18  5:39 pm   I really love whenever you incorporate your handwriting and drawings into your content, but that wasn't really a thing you did until a year or so ago I think. are you still adding cool things like that to your toolbox? got any plans to explore some more skills/tools like that?

     oh hell yeah

9.24.18  5:32 pm   is your notebook fully updated,

     not even close

      or is there stuff still left to put in like there is in the reality section?

     yes

9.24.18  5:18 pm   Have you ever pondered the possibility that there are an infinite realities, each different from the next,

     yes

     and in one of those realities the other you is more put together or happy than you?

     everyone could be the other me, or else no one is

9.24.18  5:09 pm   I don't understand any of your songs but I keep watching them anyway. Is there something wrong with me?

     no. welcome to music

9.24.18  5:03 pm   are you sure about things

     sometimes

9.24.18  4:56 pm   hey should i transcribe mt st helens

     sure

9.24.18  4:47 pm   Do you like berries?

     i am berries

9.24.18  4:12 pm   What would happen if all water became air, and all air became water?

     needless to say that would put an interesting twist on things if you know what i mean

9.24.18  4:12 pm   there's a dead fly on my lamp. what should i do?

     hold a press conference

9.24.18  3:43 pm   ok but WHY do i obsess over things

     because greatness is your responsibility

9.24.18  3:38 pm   is new song about baked goods?

     no

9.24.18  1:59 pm   how do you pronounce celeste

     i'm not entirely sure

9.24.18  1:53 pm   will there be a reference to matrix multiplication in the future of bill wurtz dot com?

     the entire site is a reference to matrix multiplication

9.24.18  1:37 pm   Which of the songs that you have made is your favorite?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

9.24.18  1:28 pm   My Grandad quitarist wonders if you do the songs all by yourself. I can tell by the videos and questions here that you do, but I want Definitive Proof(TM).

     there will be some behind the scenes footage soon where it will be easy to tell

9.24.18  1:09 pm   What are some songs you like, with titles that are just a woman's name (like 'angie' by the stones, 'julia' by the beatles, 'mandy' by barry manilow, 'billie jean' by mj, etc)?

     pamela

9.24.18  1:08 pm   why it gotta be like it is?

     maybe it doesn't

9.24.18  12:45 pm   my favorite songs are the self writing ones

     oh that's what i'm talking about

9.24.18  12:44 pm   was there ever a turning point in your life where you realized that it was time to go go go?

     it was a gradual shift, but yes

9.24.18  12:42 pm   I'm really struggling trying to find a domain name for my website. What do you think I should call it?

     that depends on what the site has is and does

9.24.18  12:12 pm   Why haven't you been paying the people in your office, and where did they go on holiday?

     i thought that song was about you

9.24.18  12:01 pm   im a writer and i find u fascinating. can i interview u?

     i'm running an ongoing interview here

9.24.18  11:12 am   What makes the blimp in the mt saint Helen's song stronger than other blimps in its peer group?

     bragging rights

9.24.18  11:08 am   What was stop-talking-about-going-home rehab like?

     a rapid stream of questions asking about my home and my relationship with homes, none of which i had a good answer for

     Was it an enjoyable experience 

     no but i became stronger

9.24.18  10:59 am   I love the vocal harmonies in your songs.. not just the arrangement/voicings of the harmonies, but the way the voices blend together so smoothly, and how the singing blends so nicely with whatever synth or keyboard sound is playing. There's some parts in your songs where I can't tell if something is being sung or played or both and it thrills me. What's your secret!?! I've listened to a lot of crazy vocal harmony music and none of it sounds quite like what you do. 

     i think setting everything to the right volume might be the secret you're looking for. another secret is actually what notes you use

9.24.18  10:55 am   Are you content with the quality of the work you have been releasing since adhering to your 2 week schedule?

     it's the best i could do

      Or do you wish you had spent more time on each video?

     i've learned that extra time ruins everything

9.24.18  10:54 am   are planes just air boats 

     i was going to say no, but now that i think about it yes

9.24.18  10:33 am   If you went on tour who would play drums 'n' stuff?

     position not filled yet

9.24.18  10:20 am   what did you major in?

     nothing

      and why did you start youtube?

     i started putting my videos there due to pressure from society

9.24.18  9:56 am   What is one track you would recommend by Kanye West?

     my lawyer has advised me not to say

9.24.18  8:27 am   Just wanted to say that "win the first hour of the day" advice is b r i l l i a n t. I am not (not not not) a "morning person", which is tough in a world that sometimes requires a lot of shit in the morning, but I just won the first hour of my day and now I am fucking AMPED to tackle the rest of the day. Feels G R E A T. I'm sure this questions page is a real pain in the ass sometimes, but for what it's worth, that gem of wisdom made a big difference for my day and I am truly grateful.

     i believe i heard it from jim kwik. he said "they say" before it, so i don't think he made it up

     Will you keep giving out wisdom forever? Thanks!

     i will try

9.24.18  8:15 am   what is the meaning of pizza?

     it is merely a vehicle for the pineapple

9.24.18  7:31 am   how to believe in skepticism?

     impossible

9.24.18  5:59 am   I teach junior high social studies in a Catholic school.  I love your history of the world.  Any chance you have a kid-friendly version?  You cover my whole curriculum!

     the main one on my youtube channel and website are very friendly for kids of that age. it's actually the adults who occasionally request that i change it

9.24.18  5:42 am   Do you have musicians in mind for when you start performing live or are you gonna like hold auditions?

     a little of both

9.24.18  4:13 am   can u do a spoken word song i think that'd be real dramatic in a good way

     i think i've done that

9.24.18  3:43 am   hey how you doin. does the rain make you happy or sad? 

     it makes me feel very good

9.24.18  2:42 am   do you have emotions 

      yes

9.24.18  2:24 am   I noticed that 1890s movie in your video. I just don't know what that alphanumeric string (in the other one) is for. Wat do?

     which one

9.24.18  1:58 am   I'm in love with your music. As a fellow musician, I am baffled by your use of chord structure. How do you go about writing these jazz, R&B, funk styled progressions? I've always loved the unexpectedness of your progressions, yet they flow seemlessly at the same time!

     they're based on the lyrics

9.24.18  1:19 am   What should I ask?

     something i did not ask you to ask

9.24.18  12:48 am   bill please go to bed,, dream of mt st helens

     spent 2 weeks thinking about it, i'd prefer to think about something else for awhile such as the moon, or licking the moon

9.24.18  12:26 am   how can i tell of i'm pregnant?

     you will start seeing ads for being pregnant

9.24.18  12:14 am   Would you consider playing some of your music live?

     yes

     Or doing a casual livestream where you jam? 

     something similar but different

9.24.18  12:02 am   what font do you use at the very end of mt st helens

     i'm not sure

9.23.18  11:45 pm   if you were a language which would you be and why

     the language of love

9.23.18  11:35 pm   Do you ever feel connected to a song?? Like you could've written it, even though you didn't??? 

     yes

9.23.18  11:33 pm   Are you ever going to have a concert?

     yes

9.23.18  11:31 pm   can you never stop making music ever

     sure

9.23.18  11:10 pm   when and where do you wanna do a live performance?

     london, new york, and more

      how many songs? 

     about 20
